about_the_game:
Esoterica Order
Jump into the unknown with this third person shooter, playing as a super soldier known as a Phantom. Taking on the enemy race called The Despair. You will be facing off against numerous threats from your typical infantry units to brute like tanks and even mechanical robots.

Objective
Each level has a ten-minute timer to take out the patrolling targets while it's unknown how many reinforcements may join the fight. Eliminate them all for victory!

Power Weapons
Such as shotguns and sniper rifles are placed in weapon crates across each level to help reach your goal. However, they are limited so be aware and choose wisely when to go for those weapons. Be advised, some crates may be empty as well.

Death Is Your Ally
Running low on ammo? No more power weapons to pick up as well? Be sure to get taken out. As a phantom death is no penalty. Jump back into the fight fully loaded.

Dash
The only ability you have that can be mastered. Use to dodge or even possible to glide over the battlefield.

Disclaimers
Losing in a level will restart match over. But Quitting you will start back at the beginning.

Minimum:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: AMD Ryzen 5 3600 6-Core Processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 2060 Super
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 40 GB available space

Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel(R) Core(TM) i7-10700k CPU @ 3.80Hz (16CPUs), ~3.8GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3060 Ti
